abstract: A variety of software is making it possible to read a book on a diversity of hardware, and to even tinker with the typeface.
snippet: A variety of software is making it possible to read a book on a diversity of hardware, and to even tinker with the typeface.
lead_paragraph: Steve Jordan, a self-published science fiction novelist, has to make lots of decisions. Although most of them involve plot points, narrative arcs and character development, Mr. Jordan has the added burden of deciding how to deliver the stories he creates to his online audience.

headline.main: Before Choosing an E-Book, Pondering the Format
